short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AA helps you Easily Download Album Artworks. Visit your Favourite Website Like Saavn, and press the esc Button on your Keyboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you Easily Download Album Artworks for your favourite songs. Just Visit the your Favourite Website and press the esc Button on your Keyboard. 

This Extension Doesn't support all websites.
